column4: hi anyone knows how I can change background @gnome3 login screen?
depends on what login manager its using. In 12.04 i belive it now changes to whatever one the user has selected.. neat trick.
or find the file its using and just edit it.
most likely theres a guide on it at the askubuntu.com site
next we'll have virtual..3D menu bars that works just when u think you'll need it :P
